flawed_nl_solution:
This many baby turtles are in the ocean: 42 / 3 = <<42/3=14>>14 turtles.
This many baby turtles are still on the sand: 42 - 14 = <<42-14=82>>82 turtles.
#### 82

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 28, not 82. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
